mapper.insert: insert into freeboard values(freeboard_seq.nextval, #{freeboard_title}, #{freeboard_content}, to_char(sysdate,'MM.DD HH:MI:SS'), 0, 1, #{freeboard_category}, #{freeboard_member_no})
mapper.update: update freeboard set freeboard_category = #{freeboard_category}, freeboard_title=#{freeboard_title}, freeboard_content = #{freeboard_content} where freeboard_no = #{freeboard_no}
update freeboard set freeboard_status = 0 where freeboard_no = #{freeboard_no}
update freeboard set freeboard_hits = freeboard_hits+1 where freeboard_no = #{freeboard_no}
